response.overview: Ana crash lands on a dangerous planet and meets a curious creature, Crawley, while waiting for rescue. When Crawley ruins her one-way ticket back, Ana must learn to trust her newfound friend to find the way home.  6KU Studios presents The Way Home, the first DigiPen student short film to be done entirely inside Unreal Engine 4. The film seeks to push the boundaries of stylized animation and define the potential of an animation pipeline in a game engine.
response.title: The Way Home

results.name: CGI 3D Animated Short: "The Way Home" - by 6KU Studios | TheCGBros
